+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on Quarters in Settlements with an Temple.
+5 healing for Units in Rural tiles.
+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms, Pastures, and Plantations in Settlements with an Temple. Warehouse bonus.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Camps and Woodcutters in Settlements with an Temple. Warehouse bonus.
+10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing Buildings in Cities with an Temple.
+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Fishing Boats in Settlements with an Temple. Warehouse bonus.

+15%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Military Units in Cities with an Temple.
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Quarters in Settlements with an Temple.
+10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing Wonders in Cities with an Temple.
+10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Settlers in Cities with an Temple.

+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Clay Pits, Mines, and Quarries in Settlements with an Temple. Warehouse bonus.
